mapper.sql: select ide.device_id, ide.device_name, ide.brand_id, ida.device_ip,ida.device_port,ida.user_name,ida.pass_word, ide.route_id, ide.route_direction, ide.device_marking_name, ide.device_type_id,ide.device_type_number, ide.device_model_id, ide.factory_library, ide.user_unit_id, ide.operator_id, ide.longitude, ide.latitude, ide.firm_id, ide.purchase_date, ide.warranty_years, ide.unit_price,ide.run_status,ide.device_status, ide.install_date, ide.maintain_id, ide.collar_agency_id, ide.pile_number, ide.manage_agency_id, ide.producte_date, ide.repair_date, ide.operate_date, ide.service_life, ide.storage_date, ide.is_monitor, ide.is_config, ide.local_info,device_pixel, ide.tunnel_id, pro.protocol_name from iot_device ide left join iot_device_access ida on ida.device_id = ide.device_id left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id=ide.manage_agency_id left join iot_device_protocol pro on ida.device_protocol_id = pro.protocol_id
mapper.select: select ide.device_id, ide.device_type_id,ide.device_type_number, ida.device_ip,ida.device_port,idp.protocol_name,ida.device_pixel from iot_device ide left join iot_device_access ida on ida.device_id = ide.device_id left join iot_device_protocol idp on ida.device_protocol_id = idp.protocol_id where ide.device_id = #{deviceId}
mapper.insert:
insert into iot_device
device_id, device_name, brand_id, route_id, route_direction, device_marking_name, device_type_id, device_type_number, device_model_id, factory_library, user_unit_id, operator_id, longitude, latitude, firm_id, purchase_date, warranty_years, unit_price, run_status, device_status, install_date, maintain_id, collar_agency_id, pile_number, manage_agency_id, producte_date, repair_date, operate_date, service_life, storage_date, is_monitor, is_config, local_info, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark,
#{deviceId}, #{deviceName}, #{brandId}, #{routeId}, #{routeDirection}, #{deviceMarkingName}, #{deviceTypeId}, #{deviceTypeNumber}, #{deviceModelId}, #{factoryLibrary}, #{userUnitId}, #{operatorId}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{firmId}, #{purchaseDate}, #{warrantyYears}, #{unitPrice}, #{runStatus}, #{deviceStatus}, #{installDate}, #{maintainId}, #{collarAgencyId}, #{pileNumber}, #{manageAgencyId}, #{producteDate}, #{repairDate}, #{operateDate}, #{serviceLife}, #{storageDate}, #{isMonitor}, #{isConfig}, #{localInfo}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{remark},
mapper.update:
update iot_device
device_name = #{deviceName}, brand_id = #{brandId}, route_id = #{routeId}, route_direction = #{routeDirection}, device_marking_name = #{deviceMarkingName},
device_type_id = #{deviceTypeId}, device_type_number = #{deviceTypeNumber}, device_model_id = #{deviceModelId}, factory_library = #{factoryLibrary}, user_unit_id = #{userUnitId}, operator_id = #{operatorId}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, firm_id = #{firmId}, purchase_date = #{purchaseDate}, warranty_years = #{warrantyYears}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, run_status = #{runStatus}, device_status = #{deviceStatus}, install_date = #{installDate}, maintain_id = #{maintainId}, collar_agency_id = #{collarAgencyId}, pile_number = #{pileNumber}, manage_agency_id = #{manageAgencyId}, producte_date = #{producteDate}, repair_date = #{repairDate}, operate_date = #{operateDate}, service_life = #{serviceLife}, storage_date = #{storageDate}, is_monitor = #{isMonitor}, is_config = #{isConfig}, local_info = #{localInfo}, create_by = #{createBy}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, remark = #{remark},
where device_id = #{deviceId}
mapper.delete:
delete from iot_device where device_id in
#{deviceId}
mapper.select: SELECT device_ip,device_port,device_pixel FROM iot_device_access where device_id = #{deviceId}
select dev_id from iot_inter_station where device_id=#{deviceId}
select count(1) from iot_device and device_status = #{deviceStatus}
SELECT device_id from iot_device where tunnel_id = #{tunnelId}
